usefulItems: square tart tin (24 cm), baking tray and paper, pastry brush, oven
title: Pumpkin, Feta and Caramelised Onion Tart

ingredients.content: 60 g butter, melted, plus extra butter for greasing
2 pinches ground black pepper, or to taste

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 200°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper and set aside. Grease a baking dish or cake tin (approx. 24 cm).
Layer pastry sheets on top of one another in prepared baking dish, spreading 50 g melted butter between sheets with a pastry brush - allowing pastry to overhang dish to form a rim.

Place red onions, olive oil, vinegar, sugar, garlic and 2 pinches salt in mixing bowl then chop <b>6 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then cook <b>9 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside to cool.
Place pumpkin, honey, remaining 1 pinch salt and pepper in mixing bowl then mix <b>10 sec//speed 2<b>. Transfer to prepared baking tray and bake for 20 minutes (200°C).
Arrange reserved red onion mixture onto pastry base.
Place baby spinach, cream and eggs in mixing bowl then mix <b>12 sec/speed 3<b>. Pour onto red onion then top with baked pumpkin.

Sprinkle tart with cherry tomatoes and feta, then brush edges of pie with remaining 10 g melted butter. Brown in oven for 10 minutes (200°C) then lower oven temperature to 180°C and cook for a further 15 minutes (180°C). Serve hot or cold.

hintsAndTricks: Serve accompanied by a green salad.
